sentences.sentence: “Remember the simple soul of your brothers and sisters in rags, ” she counseled herself.
sentences.translation: “记住那些裹在破布片中的你的兄弟姐妹们的真诚的灵魂，”她给自己忠告。

sentences.sentence: His counsel counseled him to say nothing about the affair before they met.
sentences.translation: 他的辩护人劝告他在他们会面之前保持沉默。

sentences.sentence: As a child I was always counseled by parents and teachers to study hard, work diligently and get good grades.
sentences.translation: 当我还是个孩子的时候，父母和老师都劝我用功读书，勤奋学习，获得好分数。
